item.description:
This event is rescheduled for February 28th (Sat).

It's still cold outside, let's go LaserTag...it is a great indoor activity that you can play with a group of people. I have reserved the arena for our group and have put down a deposit already. Everyone has to be there by 4:45 PM or else they will give away our time slot. The cost for LaserTag is $12 per person for two games. To make the payment processing simple, please pay me directly for $13. We will split into two teams. Please wear proper footwear (sneakers), and dressing in layers of clothes is recommended as you will be very hot and sweaty with all the running around.


LaserTag

21 Condlin Dr

Randolph, MA 02368-4000

http://www.lazerzone....

For directions: http://www.lazerzone....


Susan

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: LaserTag (Rescheduled)
